ygData.subject: Hail Warriors! Newbie here
ygData.msgSnippet: Greets! My male human warrior is Snyak - bound at Qeynos on Innorruk. I made level 9 last night - woo hoo!  Twice actually - too many stupid deaths: Holly got
ygData.messageBody:
Greets!
My male human warrior is Snyak - bound at Qeynos on Innorruk. I made level 9
last night - woo hoo! Twice actually - too many stupid deaths: Holly got me
when I was not looking, that dang Gnoll Commander in Black Burrow that hangs
out on the far side of the river on the left once you get down by the rock
and the first bridge. One time I tried to drag him back to a wizard friend
for an ambush but got dizzy and he whacked me good. Next time, I came back
with more friends - a wizard and a druid and we tried to gang him. We had
him too and then 2 more of his GS buds showed up and we were ded meat at
that point.
But he is gonna pay for that because I am coming back with all my friends
and we are gonna hand him a full can of KickButt(tm)!
So, even at level 8 I have been finding it harder and harder to get xp -
solo or in partys. I have been doing either BB (for loot) or West Karanas
(for xp). Are the aqueducts any good for low 9's? I kinda really hate
mazes and tunnels - I still get lost going to the bank! Or is it time to
venture forth? I have been to N Karanas (hate gryfawns with a passion!) and
S Karanas near Split Paw one time but MD seemed low then.
One of my goals is to try to catch a cleric friend who is at level 14 (he
got a real job so he can't play EQ all day long no more :-) But I am up for
adventure as well. And I have spent some time helping others and that's fun
too.
Any thoughts?
